list_definition.definition: to (cause to) come together in one place

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A crowd of people gathered near the accident.

list_definition.definition: to learn (from what has been seen, heard etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I gather you are leaving tomorrow.
He gathered strawberries from the garden
She went to the library to gather information for her class project.

list_definition.definition: to pull (material) into small folds and stitch together

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She gathered the skirt at the waist.

list_definition.definition: a fold in material, a piece of clothing etc.
